skins.shipDescription: Mutsuki-class destroyer number one C Mutsuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Mutsuki, I'm in the "Thirtieth Destroyer Division," and I'm the oldest Mutsuki-class ship! There are newer ships, but I'm strong! I love candy! I hate Stu... Um... I can't pronounce that... Stookuhs? I hate those!
skins.acquisition: Co... main... der? Are you like my mommy or daddy? Hm? Ah, it's Commander! This my candy, I'm not giving you any!
skins.login: You want some candy too, Comainder? You're not getting any of mine!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Co... main... der? I can't pronounce that... "Mommy" and "daddy" are easier to pronounce!
skins.secretaryIdle2: First apple, then mango... next time I'll buy one that tastes like strawberry!
skins.secretaryIdle3: One, two, three, four... I forgot... six... after that comes... eleven! Then nineteen! I did it!
skins.secretaryTouch: I won't give you my candy, even if you are the comainder!

skins.shipDescription: Comainder, I'm done retrofitting! Have some candy! Hm? You're always nice to me, so I'm giving you some candy!
skins.acquisition: Comainder, I'm done retrofitting! Have some candy! Hm? You're always nice to me, so I'm giving you some candy!
skins.login: Comainder, what candy do you want today? I have all kinds!
skins.details: This one's for Kisaragi... this one's for the Comainder... this one's for me... Okay, that's everything!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Co-main-der! Comain-der! Comainder! Hehehe~ I just wanted to say your name!
skins.secretaryIdle2: What candy do you like, Comainder? I'll bring more of it next time!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Comainder, let's call Kisaragi over so we can play house together!
skins.secretaryTouch: Comainder, you want candy, too? Here!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Merry Christmas~! I am on my best behavior today as well! Uuu... when is Santa Claus going to come? I'm sleepy...
skins.acquisition: Commander, Merry Christmas~! I am on my best behavior today as well! Uuu... when is Santa Claus going to come? I'm sleepy...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Santa... Claus...? Ah! I know this person!

skins.shipDescription: Comainder, I put on my yukata just like you said! Ehehe, you should take me to the festival so I can get lots and lots of candy!
skins.acquisition: Comainder, I put on my yukata just like you said! Ehehe, you should take me to the festival so I can get lots and lots of candy!
skins.details: Chocolate bananas and taiyaki~ are all delicious~ but compared to candy...? Let's call it a draw~
skins.secretaryIdle1: The fireworks are so pretty~ Comainder, can we put on fireworks every day?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Comainder, I want this candy! Um, I want that one too!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The prize for goldfish scooping is a special flavor candy?! Comainder, let's go do that right now!
skins.secretaryTouch: Aww... my scooper broke again... goldfish scooping is so hard! Comainder, come help!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: The candy's going to fall out!

skins.shipDescription: I heard that if I go around telling people "Happy New Year," I can get lots of goodies! Ehehe, I hope they'll give me a bunch of candy!
